title: Users Schemas
description: Auto-generated JSON schemas for users models

CourseMemberProviderAccountUpdate.description: Request payload to set or update a provider account for a course member.

provider_account_id.description: Account identifier on the external provider (e.g., GitLab username)
provider_account_id.title: Provider Account Id

provider_access_token.description: Personal access token or credential to verify provider ownership
provider_access_token.title: Provider Access Token

CourseMemberProviderAccountUpdate.title: CourseMemberProviderAccountUpdate

transient.description: Whether this is a transient membership
transient.title: Transient

id.description: User ID (UUID will be generated if not provided)
id.title: Id

UserPassword.description: Password update request for user endpoints.

username.description: Target username (admin only, otherwise current user)
username.title: Username

password_old.description: Old password (required for non-admin password changes)
password_old.title: Password Old
